message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%.  Think about it, Bob -  the longer we wait, the less this money is worth!
I think a 60/40 split is fairer.  Let's not waste too much time on this,  the money is losing value fast!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but 70/30 is my final offer.  If we keep going,  the money will become practically worthless.  Let's be reasonable.
